remarks: The composition of permutations fixing one element also fixes this element.  (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2019.)
statement:
gsmsymgrfix.s $e |- S = ( SymGrp ` N ) $.
gsmsymgrfix.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
gsmsymgrfix $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ K e. N /\ W e. Word B ) -> ( A. i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( ( W ` i ) ` K ) = K -> ( ( S gsum W ) ` K ) = K ) ) $.
$d B i $.
$d K i $.
$d N i $.
$d W i $.
